segments.text: I need to cancel my reservation . I have personal matters that need fixing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not a problem . Just give me your name , phone number , and date of visit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see your info here on the screen . I'll hit just one button , sir , and you're cancelled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I'm glad that wasn't too much of a bother .
segments.speaker: S1
